void OpenSim.Region.Framework.Interfaces.ILLClientInventory.AddInventoryItem ( IClientAPI  remoteClient,
InventoryItemBase  item 
)

Add an inventory item to an avatar's inventory.

Parameters:
remoteClient The remote client controlling the avatar
item The item. This structure contains all the item metadata, including the folder in which the item is to be placed.

InventoryFolderBase OpenSim.Region.Framework.Interfaces.ILLClientInventory.GiveInventoryFolder ( UUID  recipientId,
UUID  senderId,
UUID  folderId,
UUID  recipientParentFolderId 
)

Give an entire inventory folder from one user to another. The entire contents (including all descendent folders) is given.

Parameters:
recipientId 
senderId ID of the sender of the item
folderId 
recipientParentFolderId The id of the receipient folder in which the send folder should be placed. If UUID.Zero then the recipient folder is the root folder
Returns:
The inventory folder copy given, null if the copy was unsuccessful

Implemented in Aurora.Modules.Inventory.LLClientInventory.

UUID  senderId,
UUID  itemId,
UUID  recipientFolderId,
bool  doOwnerCheck 
)

Give an inventory item from one user to another.

Parameters:
recipient 
senderId ID of the sender of the item
itemId 
recipientFolderId The id of the folder in which the copy item should go. If UUID.Zero then the item is placed in the most appropriate default folder.
Returns:
The inventory item copy given, null if the give was unsuccessful

Implemented in Aurora.Modules.Inventory.LLClientInventory.

InventoryItemBase OpenSim.Region.Framework.Interfaces.ILLClientInventory.MoveTaskInventoryItemToUserInventory ( UUID  destId,
UUID  uUID,
ISceneChildEntity  m_host,
UUID  objId,
bool  checkPermissions 
)

Move the given item from the object task inventory to the agent's inventory.

Parameters:
remoteClient 
folderID The user inventory folder to move (or copy) the item to. If null, then the most suitable system folder is used (e.g. the Objects folder for objects). If there is no suitable folder, then the item is placed in the user's root inventory folder
part 
itemID 
checkPermissions 

Implemented in Aurora.Modules.Inventory.LLClientInventory.

void OpenSim.Region.Framework.Interfaces.ILLClientInventory.RezScript ( UUID  srcId,
ISceneChildEntity  m_host,
UUID  destId,
int  pin,
int  running,
int  start_param 
)

Rez a script into a prim's inventory from another prim This is used for the LSL function llRemoteLoadScriptPin and requires a valid pin to be used.

Parameters:
srcId The UUID of the script that is going to be copied
srcPart The prim that the script that is going to be copied from
destId The UUID of the prim that the
pin The ScriptAccessPin of the prim
running Whether the script should be running when it is started
start_param The start param to pass to the script

Implemented in Aurora.Modules.Inventory.LLClientInventory.

Property Documentation

string OpenSim.Region.Framework.Interfaces.ILLClientInventory.DefaultLSLScript [get, set]

The default LSL script that will be added when a client creates a new script in inventory or in the task object inventory.

Implemented in Aurora.Modules.Inventory.LLClientInventory.
